verses.verse: Come near<WH7126>, ye nations<WH1471>, to hear<WH8085>; and hearken<WH7181>, ye peoples<WH3816>: let the earth<WH776> hear<WH8085>, and the fulness thereof<WH4393>; the world<WH8398>, and all things that come forth from it<WH6631>.

For Jehovah<WH3068> hath indignation<WH7110> against all the nations<WH1471>, and wrath<WH2534> against all their host<WH6635>: he hath utterly destroyed<WH2763> them<WH5414>, he hath delivered them to the slaughter<WH2874>.

Their slain<WH2491> also shall be cast out<WH7993>, and the stench<WH889> of their dead bodies<WH6297> shall come up<WH5927>; and the mountains<WH2022> shall be melted<WH4549> with their blood<WH1818>.

And all the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> shall be dissolved<WH4743>, and the heavens<WH8064> shall be rolled together<WH1556> as a scroll<WH5612>; and all their host<WH6635> shall fade away<WH5034>, as the leaf<WH5929> fadeth from off<WH5034> the vine<WH1612>, and as a fading<WH5034> leaf from the fig-tree<WH8384>.
For my sword<WH2719> hath drunk<WH7301> its fill in heaven<WH8064>: behold<WH3381>, it shall come down upon Edom<WH123>, and upon the people<WH5971> of my curse<WH2764>, to judgment<WH4941>.

The sword<WH2719> of Jehovah<WH3068> is filled<WH4390> with blood<WH1818>, it is made fat<WH1878> with fatness<WH2459>, with the blood<WH1818> of lambs<WH3733> and goats<WH6260>, with the fat<WH2459> of the kidneys<WH3629> of rams<WH352>; for Jehovah<WH3068> hath a sacrifice<WH2077> in Bozrah<WH1224>, and a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH2874> in the land<WH776> of Edom<WH123>.

And the wild-oxen<WH7214> shall come down<WH3381> with them<WH6499>, and the bullocks with the bulls<WH47>: and their land<WH776> shall be drunken<WH7301> with blood<WH1818>, and their dust<WH6083> made fat<WH1878> with fatness<WH2459>.
For Jehovah<WH3068> hath a day<WH3117> of vengeance<WH5359>, a year<WH8141> of recompense<WH7966> for the cause<WH7379> of Zion<WH6726>.

And the streams<WH5158> of Edom shall be turned<WH2015> into pitch<WH2203>, and the dust<WH6083> thereof into brimstone<WH1614>, and the land<WH776> thereof shall become burning<WH1197> pitch<WH2203>.

It shall not be quenched<WH3518> night<WH3915> nor day<WH3119>; the smoke<WH6227> thereof shall go up<WH5927> for ever<WH5769>; from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> it shall lie waste<WH2717>; none shall pass through<WH5674> it for ever<WH5331> and ever<WH5331>.

But the pelican<WH6893> and the porcupine<WH7090> shall possess<WH3423> it<WH3244>; and the owl and the raven<WH6158> shall dwell<WH7931> therein<WH5186>: and he will stretch over it the line<WH6957> of confusion<WH8414>, and the plummet<WH68> of emptiness<WH922>.
They shall call<WH7121> the nobles<WH2715> thereof to the kingdom<WH4410>, but none shall be there<WH8269>; and all its princes shall be nothing<WH657>.

And thorns<WH5518> shall come up<WH5927> in its palaces<WH759>, nettles<WH7057> and thistles<WH2336> in the fortresses<WH4013> thereof<WH5116>; and it shall be a habitation of jackals<WH8577>, a court<WH2681> for ostriches<WH1323>.

And the wild beasts of the desert<WH6728> shall meet<WH6298> with the wolves<WH338>, and the wild goat<WH8163> shall cry<WH7121> to his fellow<WH7453>; yea<WH3917>, the night-monster shall settle<WH7280> there<WH4672>, and shall find her a place of rest<WH7280>.

There shall the dart-snake<WH7091> make her nest<WH7077>, and lay<WH4422>, and hatch<WH1234>, and gather<WH1716> under her shade<WH6738>; yea<WH1772>, there shall the kites be gathered<WH6908>, every one<WH802> with her mate<WH7468>.

Seek ye out<WH1875> of the book<WH5612> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and read<WH7121>: no one<WH259> of these<WH2007> shall be missing<WH5737>, none<WH802> shall want<WH6485> her mate<WH7468>; for my mouth<WH6310>, it hath commanded<WH6680>, and his Spirit<WH7307>, it hath gathered them<WH6908>.

And he hath cast<WH5307> the lot<WH1486> for them<WH3027>, and his hand hath divided<WH2505> it unto them by line<WH6957>: they shall possess<WH3423> it for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>; from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> shall they dwell therein<WH7931>.
